global_attributes.comment: This deployment (R00004) consists of two smaller deployments: a cross-shelf transect from 2017-06-10T12:15 to 2017-06-11T00:36 and an along-shelf transect from 2017-06-11T02:44 to 2017-06-11T23:17UTC. The first across-shelf transect was broken into two smaller runs (Runs A and B) because the mission had to be aborted so parameters could be updated. These files are associated with Run A only.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer NES REMUS 600m AUV A6263
